configureStatementTimeout

public java.util.TimerTask configureStatementTimeout(java.sql.Statement aStatement,
                                                     IAspectDBConnectionPool aConnection)
                                              throws java.sql.SQLException
Will return a timer task registered with a timer to cancel the given statement if it doesn't complete within the timeout period specified in the connectionpool if this connection pool is configured to use the TIMER timeout method. Otherwise if using the SET method the statement will be configured with a query timeout will return null.

Throws:
java.sql.SQLException
